title: Turkey chili
directions: Coat large pot with olive oil and combine onion, bell pepper, and garlic. Cook until onions are translucent, about ten minutes, and then add turkey.
Brown the turkey, season with spices, and use a wooden spoon to break up the pieces. Add beer and let simmer for ten more minutes.
Add tomatoes and beans, cover, turn down low, and let simmer for 1 hour.
Season some more, add tomato paste, and simmer uncovered for twenty more minutes.
Serve chili with avocados, cheddar cheese, sour cream, and scallions mixed in!
ingredients: 5 cloves of minced garlic [5 1/2 tsps of canned minced garlic]
1 can drained, washed dark red kidney beans
1 can of diced tomatoes, with juices
